TF051136-PHRD-UKRAINE: EQUAL ACCESS TO

abstracts.cdata!:
The Equal Access to Quality Education
            Project for Ukraine aims to provide equal access to quality
            education and improved efficiency of the education system to
            prepare Ukraine's graduates for the knowledge society.
            The project has the following three components. The first
            component will raise the awareness, knowledge and
            professional competencies of teachers and school directors
            in order to implement the reforms underway in general
            education; the second component will support efforts to
            improve the conditions of teaching and learning in secondary
            schools; and the third component will strengthen the policy
            development and management capacities of the Ministry of
            Education and Science and other institutions responsible for
            work on education, support optimization and rehabilitate schools.
